summary: A simple recolor of Ponytail Hairstyles.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply recolors the base textures from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/]Ponytail Hairsyles[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/907295]Azar[/url] from blonde to light grey, to allow for more precise hair colors.
With the original texture, if you tried to have white hair, it would just look like a bright orange/blonde, and if you tried to have black hair, it would just look like a dark brown/red, now with this mod you can have a true black or white hair if you wish, since the base texture is now colorless. Check the screenshots to notice more clearly what i'm talking about.

Requierments:
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/]Ponytail Hairstyles[/url]

Credits:
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/907295]Azar[/url], for the original mod.
author: Mateo
